Fofo's cave

About

Hi, I'm Rodolfo Padilla. I'm a student at UNED in the ECEN department, where my studies include, computer science, sociology and other stuff.

I'm obsessed with technology, and have engaged on the lifelong trek towards sustainable energy for those purposes.

Currently working as Implementation Engineer at GAP, also doing 3d printing and diy robotics as a hobby. I also like assembling embedded computers and such.

I like to be constanly learning, web development mainly these days. I believe I am at the state to make a living by doing it and turn some ideas into reality.

This blog is a central place for me to publish my musings on programming, sociology, mathematics, philosophy, astronomy and all sorts of other fascinating. In the very unlikely case that the Internet cares about my personal development, I might post some progress in some projects I am working on

I am also an electrician, I have some experience doing industrial automation, pretty much any device powered by electricity.
